entry.title: dotnet/announcements - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24895: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #261
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24897: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #260
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24936: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #259
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #258
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-29331: .NET Denial of Service vulnerability #257
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE 2023-29337 | NuGet Client Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #256
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-32032: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #255
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33126: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #254
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33128: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #253
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33135: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #252
  • .NET June 2023 updates #251

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.IO.IOException: Unable to write data to the transport connection: Broken pipe. #87521
  • FileSystemInfo.ResolveLinkTarget(true) returns erroneous path when symlink points to a network share #87516
  • Assertion failed '((regArgMaskLive & RBM_FLTARG_REGS) == 0) && "Homing of float argument registers with circular dependencies not implemented."' #87515
    8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add a test for trimming method body #87513
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'assignedInterval->isActive == false' #87511
    8.0.0
  • Test failures: Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Binder.SourceGeneration.Tests #87508
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: System.Private.Xml.Tests #87506
    8.0.0
  • EventPipe failures in Native AOT #87505
    8.0.0
  • Ensure that `EnableHWIntrinsic=0` can have `getMaxVectorByteLength` return `0` #87502
    Future
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24897: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #87501
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-24936: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #87500
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-29331: .NET Denial of Service vulnerability #87498
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-32032: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #87496
  • Cannot debug Blazor .net 8 WASM app #87491
  • IsolatedStorage tests failing on CI on maccatalyst #87485
  • JsonDocument not thread safe at high load #87483
  • [wasm][7.0-staging] `System.Runtime.Intrinsics`, and `System.Runtime` tests with AOT timing out on windows #87482
  • System.Threading.Tasks.Task.WhenAny<TResult>(IEnumerable) inconsistently does not use current scheduler for tasks #87481
  • [API Proposal]: Bring back extensions API to ease adoption of extensions libraries from older frameworks #87480
    8.0.0
  • Quic connection idle timeout kicks in while HTTP/3 request is in progress #87478
  • Tests.System.TimeProviderTests.TestProviderTimer test failure #87477
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 76 Regressions from tracking VectorT as "optimistic" for crossgen2 #87486
  • JIT: Last-use copy elision does not handle IR created by physical promotion #87471
  • SerializationGuard bloats the binary size on NAOT #87470
  • TarFile.ExtractToDirectory is unable to extract tar archives with hard links. #87463
  • Improve the JsonSerializerOptions.MakeReadOnly() exception message. #87460
    8.0.0
  • [nativeaot][ios] SIGSEGV error caused by NullReferenceException handling on iOS device #87458
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Stopwatch.ToString() #87449
  • System.UriBuilder cannot build a correct mailto URI #87446
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] GC events don't get logged on Linux #87445
    8.0.0
  • [7.0][mono][arm64] futex-internal.h: No such file or directory - futex_wait_cancelable native crash in Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Generators.Roslyn3.11.Tests #87444
  • ComInterfaceGenerator should warn if a type passed to MarshalUsing is not accessible from the generated code. #87443

Closed

  • Crossgen cross-targeting fails when generating symbols #87527
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-28260: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #87499
  • The ETW event generated by EventSource.SendManifest is lost at receiver due to size limit when extended data is appended #87255
    8.0.0
  • LibraryImportGenerator should generate code using "global::" #86786
    8.0.0
  • [STJ] NumberHandling property of JsonSerializerOptions is ignored when using json SrcGen #79511
    8.0.0
  • JSON source gen doesn't detect [JsonNumberHandling] when applied to POCO #58638
    8.0.0
  • Compiling application with LanguageExt as a dependency and ReadyToRun enabled using .NET 6 #66079
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Perf pipeline completely broken #87434
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Directed/arglist/vararg_TargetWindows/vararg_TargetWindows #87389
  • Test failure: JIT/Directed/StructABI/MisSizedStructs_ArmArch/MisSizedStructs_ArmArch.dll #87408
    8.0.0
  • Test failure: JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_65937/Runtime_65937/Runtime_65937.dll #87409
    8.0.0
  • CA5392 Misses Violations on Local P/Invoke Functions Generated by LibraryImportGenerator #81939
    8.0.0
  • Fix NativeAOT EventPipe tests for non-windows platforms #80999
    8.0.0
  • Leverage common container code for NativeAOT EventPipe #81002
    8.0.0
  • Prevent source-gen from generating code for private fields and those marked with JsonIgnore #76919
    8.0.0
  • File.Copy: Clone file when possible on MacOS #77835
    8.0.0
  • [6.0 & 7.0][browser] CultureInfoConstructor TestCreationWithICUNormalizedNames - Culture is not supported (Parameter 'name') #87448
    7.0.x
  • WindowsServiceLifetime.ServiceName is empty in NET6 #87309
  • Seeing HTTP Client timeout issue after upgrading to dotnet core 6.0 #84388
    8.0.0
  • System.Reflection.Tests.AssemblyTests.GetSatelliteAssemblyNeg fails #67569
    Future
  • The token supplied to the function is invalid at System.Net.NTAuthentication.GetOutgoingBlob #80781
    8.0.0
  • More usable reflection-free mode #67193
    Future
  • System.Text.Json.JsonSerializer should throw an Exception when deserializing required properties with null value #87472
  • [browser][debugger][MT] CallFunctionOnTests.RunOnInvalidCfoId #87315
    8.0.0
  • Optimize new Vector3 { X=,Y=,Z=} pattern #84543
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR, CoreRT and Android #63384
    Future
  • Test failure JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/ConstantFolding/StaticReadonlySimd/StaticReadonlySimd #87390
    8.0.0
  • Investigate size of `.rela.dyn` section on Linux #76657
    8.0.0
  • Speed up access to threadstatics on ARM64 #73997
    8.0.0
  • Build method of ConfigurationBuilder taking too much time while initializing pods under kubernetes #87018
    Future
  • Improve experience when using PublishAot with unsupported RID #73678
    8.0.0
  • [8.0.100-preview.6.23310.1] System.Globalization.CultureNotFoundException: "Culture is not supported." #87394
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Tar: Ensure trailing separator in sanitized path for extraction #87534
    area-System.Formats.Tar
  • Don't set mark array bits for UOH objects during concurrent marking #87533
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Perf optimization of module scanning for generic cycle detection #87532
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][IGNORE] debugging WBT failure #87531
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix GetILFunctionBody for dynamic methods #87530
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.8 #87526
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.19 #87525
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #87524
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #87523
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Fix DependencyContext splitting on semi-colon #87518
    area-DependencyModel
  • [Mono] Update Mono build README.md #87517
    documentation
  • Apply iteration work limits to X509 certificate loading #87514
    area-System.Security, 8.0.0
  • Faster optimized frozen dictionary creation (1/n) #87510
    area-System.Collections, tenet-performance
  • Fix StrictlyBlittable check to work for "source Compilation" references. #87507
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Remove a couple of asserts, which are no longer valid, from getMaxVectorTByteLength #87504
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Block "Convert To LibraryImport" in more unsupported cases #87503
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Add delay load hook for singlefilehost and enable delay load of version.dll #87495
    area-Single-File
  • Report warnings for COM interfaces with instance properties or events #87492
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Invoke startup hook from ApplyStartupHook diagnostic command #87490
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove some unnecessary Substrings #87479
    area-Meta
  • [QUIC] Moved a test using external server to outerloop #87476
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [browser][debugger][MT] Make operations on dictionary thread-safe follow-up #87474
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Generate fewer GenericMethodHashtable entries #87466
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SPMI: Unify error handling path for replay and asmdiffs #87464
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove test exclusions for Json tests #87457
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix encoding of CallGCregs #87467
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [6.0] Reset System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs OOB #87528
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Reset System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs OOB #87529
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Improve the performance of the type loader through various tweaks #85743
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Add Diagnostics for ComClassGenerator #87436
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [mono][jit] Add JIT support for the methods in Vector128<T> on amd64. #86546
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Shrink ManifestEnvelope.MaxChunkSize to hold extended data #87322
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Update debugging-vscode.md #87338
    area-Meta
  • Emit additional attributes with global qualifier #87497
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • Subject src-gen serializer to full number-handling test #87484
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #87494
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #87493
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [wasm] Change optimization flag to workaround llvm issue #87473
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Fix perf pipeline #87469
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix break from wchar_t usage in disableddotnetruntime #87509
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 7.0.7 #86300
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix WCHAR definition on non-Windows for nativeaot #87465
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-staging] Reset OOB packages from 6.0.18 #86299
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #87462
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #87461
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Clone files on OSX-like platforms when possible, instead of copying the whole file #79243
    area-System.IO, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Don't return `0` from `getMaxVectorByteLength` when intrinsics are disabled #87420
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [6.0-staging] Bump branding to 6.0.20 #87453
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0-staging] Bump branding to 7.0.9 #87455
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [7.0] Bump Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms #87489
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [6.0] Bump Microsoft.NETCore.Platforms #87488
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • The CLA bot can now be rerun with a comment. Fix broken CLA links. #86825
    documentation, area-Meta
  • Fix missing GC counter data on non-Windows #87430
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Combine two table lookups into one while formatting Guid on Arm64 #87126
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • ApplyStartupHook diagnostic IPC command #86813
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Redirect ActiveIssue on a test #87468
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger][MT] Make operations on dictionary thread-safe. #87405
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Fold const WithElement to CNS_VEC #86212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable the PackedSimd.Shuffle intrinsic. #86025
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd load and load scalar methods #87052
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Handle commas in physical promotion #87401
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use INS_inc for Interlocked.Increment #87442
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Properly check ISAs for static readonly simd fields #87402
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Ensure that types of ignored or inaccessible properties are not included by the source generator. #87383
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [manual] Merge 'release/7.0-staging' into 'release/7.0' #87452
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge 'release/6.0-staging' into 'release/6.0' #87451
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • [release/7.0-staging] add RID for Debian 12 #87441
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] add RID for Debian 12 #87440
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [NativeAOT] Avoid redundant unwind info lookup during stackwalks #87419
    tenet-performance, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [Test Only] Test Cleanup #87456
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 6.0.x
  • [PERF][Mono] Update HelloiOS.app publish folder path. #87439
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [Test Only] Test Cleanup #87450
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Globalization, 7.0.x
  • Fix neutral cultures created with the underscore #87411
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • Warn when user code casts between runtime-based COM interop types and source-generated COM interop types #87425
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Disable StressTestDeepNestingOfLoops for NonBacktracking engine #87369
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • add RID for Debian 12 #87433
    area-Host
  • Fix determinism stress perf #87447
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Adapt Tarjan generic cycle detector for use in Crossgen2 #71426
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

Updated

  • Add Keyed Services Support to Dependency Injection #87183
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, api-ready-for-review
  • LSRA-throughput: Iterate over the regMaskTP instead all registers #87424

  • Implement `ExperimentalAttribute` #85444
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation

    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2200064 #87296
    area-System.Text.Json
  • [CoreCLR] `UnsafeAccessorAttribute` non-generic support #86932
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Add the capability of trimming IL code of individual methods #86722
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • JIT: Add support for induced field accesses in physical promotion #87410
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use optimized Index.GetOffset in Range.GetOffsetAndLength #87317

    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure

    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0

  • [QUIC] Fix rooted connection when hanshake failed #87328

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Enable tests and fix bugs #2307

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Stub out finalization and enable some tests #2306

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix a determinism issue in `lowerSpillTempsLiveAcrossSafePoints` #2299
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Introduce `wasmjit-diff.ps1` #2302
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Put LLVM helpers into the `CorInfoHelpFunc` enum directly #2303
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use `OperExceptions` in div/mod lowering/codegen #2305

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Use a universal stub for interface dispatch #2304
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Initial version of a multi-threaded compiler #2297

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33126: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33214
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33128: .NET Remote Code Execution Vulnerability #33211
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2023-33135: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #33210
  • [NETSDKE2E]Error happens "Workload installation failed: Access to the path 'C:\ProgramData\dotnet\workloads\Microsoft.NET.Runtime.MonoAOTCompiler.Task.Msi.x64\8.0.0-preview.6.23307.4\msi.json' is denied." when installing workload using another account. #33198
  • Fix error code to maintain consistency #33196

Closed

  • "dotnet publish" is missing dependency files #14621
  • Unable to build website that targets .net core 3.1 after installing .net 5 #14609
  • Visual studio doesn't support .netcore sdk 3.1 #14623
  • OutputPath contains double path separator leading to NU5019 in nuget pack #32971
  • Unable to build projects due to Xcode mismatch #33161

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #33222
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.3xx #33216
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.1xx #33215
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.4xx #33213
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.3xx #33212
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #33209
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #33208
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #33207
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2199968 #33223
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33159
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Backport '[Blazor WASM] Don't apply hot reload deltas if Blazor has not been initialized' #33160
    Servicing-approved, Area-AspNetCore
  • Set PlatformName and other properties early enough in outer build #33003
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Enable error when using BinaryFormatter in GenerateResource #32981
    untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2198336 #33169
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/6.0.4xx] Fix error code to maintain consistency #33195
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Fix error code to maintain consistency #33197
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Swap the 1205 and 1206 error codes #33189
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Enable the task unit test projects in helix and apply fixes to them. #33184
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Containers] Fix registry operations that use chunks and various resiliency enhancements #33019
    Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • `is` expression evaluating `const` expression should be considered constant #6926

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify how *ref-safe-to-escape*/*safe-to-escape* are calculated for inline array operations. #7272

Merged

  • Update collection-literals.md #7273
  • Create CL-2023-06-12.md #7271

Updated

  • Add speclet for `ref readonly` parameters #7165

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense not work with interface #68594
  • [BUG] cannot rename symbols across projects #68593
    Preview 1.1
  • Extract method doesn't highlight newly named method fully #68592
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] References Code Lens always enabled #68591
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] When upgrading to dev kit the source generators no longer work. #68590
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] Documentation comments missing newline support and indentation #68589
    17.7 P4
  • [BUG] Analyzers and code fixes not working in C# Dev Kit? #68588
    17.7 P4
  • Add missing using directives on paste #68586
  • Project system error randomly on `ActionBlockSlimAsync` #68584
  • Duplicate variable declaration allowed #68583
  • Make brackets of class and methods bold #68582
  • collapse one-line xml comments too in C# files #68581
  • Battery/power save mode #68580
  • C# editor should provide a collapsable region for comments #68579
  • Incorrect IDE0045 simplified if expression #68578
  • `GetTypeInfo` returns incorrectly null-annotated types for deconstruction #68572
  • Cache vs-mef composition to improve startup perf #68568
  • Use smarter source text implementation in LSP server #68567

Closed

  • [BUG] wrong variable highlights #68587
    17.7 P4
  • EnC: Adding public method to a library and invoking it within the same edit session #68293
  • Incorrect error message on using static directive with alias to non-named type #68546
  • Need to add support for `using unsafe static <Type>;` #67329
    C# 12.0
  • Var CodeLens #68585
    17.7 P4
  • C# 11 required properties do not compile on dotnet 6 #68478
  • Restrict background analysis scope to reduce CPU consumption in live analysis #38429
    16.5
  • Partial class implementing identically named file interfaces with identically named members should not confuse them #68219
    17.7

PullRequests

Created

  • Generic interceptors #68602
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • EnC: Stop reporting CS7101 on runtime that supports generic updates #68601
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Refactor BindExtensionMethod method and add some assertions #68599
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update handling of collection literals with no target type #68598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Flesh out implementation of ref-safety rules for inline array operations. #68597
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Revert "Switch to new lower-overhead spell checking protocol" #68569
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Fix error message when trying to use using-static with an invalid type #68571
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Fix document-highlights not working in vscode #68596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove stale comments #68557
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Merge latest bits from `main` into `roles` feature branch #68524
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • add review comment to sb files #68409
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Improve error reporting around inline array access. #68551
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays
  • Only make members required when RequiredMemberAttribute is present #68577
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Package Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Test.Utilities for razor #68417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge "interceptors" experimental feature to main #68564
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Gracefully handle no analyzers case in DiagnosticComputer #68545
    Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, untriaged, Next
  • Address remaining feedback from #68547 #68570
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Add new (hopefully easier) telemetry mechanism #68261
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Include file-local name prefix in names of explicit interface implementations #68331
    Area-Compilers, Next

Updated

  • Don't rebind object initializer parents #68449
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Correct interpolated string addition parts counting #68562
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Improve collection literal parsing #68561
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic snippets - `for` and `forr` snippets #68508

  • Handle folders in source-generated file paths #68494

  • Move tests of `IDE0060` to `VerifyCS` #68350

  • Add and emit ref kind for ref readonly parameters #68179

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

    Backlog

    8.0-preview7

    8.0-rc1
  • Trigger navigation callbacks in all Blazor hosts #48766
    8.0-preview7

  • net8.0-browser TFM integration with build/publish/SWA #48757
  • Handle forms with Blazor SSR #46688
    8.0-preview6

  • [Blazor] Mechanism for rendering a "remote" component on to the page. #46704
    8.0-preview6
  • Startup APIs for enabling Server/WebAssembly hosting #46992
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Set component render mode either at the call site or in the component itself #46994
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Blazor WebAssembly not caching in browser #48748
  • Kestrel connection metrics - add protocol and TLS info? #47831
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Import “google/api/annotations.proto” was not found or had errors. #48589
  • Perf improvement: caching, fortunes, single_query #48715
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper #48716

Created

Merged

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Installing .net preview 8 removes Maui templates #15618

    .NET 8

    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_New Recipe_Labels or Instructions: In "New Recipe" screen required fields are not marked up with any chevron/symbols. #15597
    .NET 8
  • A11y_.NET Core_Recipes App My Recipes New_New Recipe_Voiceover: Voice over is not announcing the "Review" label for slider, Minus, Plus buttons. #15595
    .NET 8
  • Different sizing and layouting strategy on different platforms #15594
    Backlog
  • [XVS][VSM][MAUI] The launch screen of the app is not correct on android and iOS target. #15593
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI]The Vertical CollectionView rendering is incorrect when scrolling "Breakfast" to bottom on iOS and Maccatalyst target. #15592
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] The page cannot scroll to the bottom and the botton text is truncated on iOS and Maccatalyst target. #15591
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] The card is truncated when scrolling to the right of the page on iOS target. #15590
    .NET 8
  • [MAUI] After rotating the Emulator/Simulator to horizontal orientation, the text in the picture disappears and the button is truncated. #15589
    .NET 8

  • UWP backend for .NET MAUI. #15568

    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-06-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Flexible HasData seeding behaviors #31072
  • Technical debt: always produce inline/parameter query roots in preprocessing #31069
  • Include parent entity column name in child entity column name using data annotations #31068

Closed

  • Querying nested json boolean throws an exception #31071
  • Cosmos: queryable primitive collections #31070
  • Support join with enumerable on client #17031
  • Cosmos: translate IN with parameter values again, and possibly other Cosmos-specific patterns #31051
  • Support arbitrary expressions in inline collections (translate to VALUES) #30734
    8.0.0
  • Allow inline primitive collections with parameters, translating to VALUES #30732
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Code cleanup & modernization #31077
  • Json reader sandbox rebase #31076
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31075
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0 #31073
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0 #31074
  • Support customized reading and writing of JSON values #31021
  • Support any expression type inside inline primitive collections #31046
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.6.23312.4 #31067

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Fix handling of queries with RETURNING clause #31013
    Servicing-approved
  • Always convert to parameter query roots in relational #30966
  • Add support for DATA_COMPRESSION and SORT_IN_TEMPDB SQL Server index options #30831
